name: Pwn Star Linux
short_description: Pwn Star Linux (AKA PwnStar) is a VMware virtual machine for hacking. Based off of BackTrack linux, it is made to be an all purpose tool for all situations. It includes WiFi hacking tools, remote exploitation tools, stress testing tools, vulnerability scanners, network/port scanners, privilege escalation tools, forensics tools, various services, including MySQL and Apache, reverse engineering tools, things for maintaining access, and a handful of custom tools for various things, including denial of service, and others. It is currently is alpha. One thing that sets it apart from other distros, is that it has various KDE and GNOME tools, as well as being able to type startkde in GNOME to start an experamental KDE system.
